english.segment1: Independent. I leave you now, To drown in desolation, Oblivious to no one.
english.segment2: Perpetual comparison, You realized when I left that you were done, You're done!
english.segment3: Suffer!. 'cause this would be your fault. I know it's just another lie..
english.segment4: You expect me to succumb, Snuff your insecurities. You bounce from friend to friend, You're nothing but a memory of treasure lost.
english.segment5: We stumbled side by side, We all tried to ignore, The promises you never kept. You realized when I left that you were wrong, You're wrong!
english.segment6: Suffer!. 'cause this would be your fault. I know it's just another lie..
